title: Watch Face - Matrix fans
description: Watch Face for Matrix fansFeatures: (1) Font customization(2) Effect customization (Speed, Density, Effect, etc.)How to customize:1. Go to Android Wear app.2. Tap on the MatrixWatchFace to open the configuration.Enjoy!
descriptionHTML:
Watch Face for Matrix fans
Features:
(1) Font customization
(2) Effect customization (Speed, Density, Effect, etc.)

How to customize:
1. Go to Android Wear app.
2. Tap on the MatrixWatchFace to open the configuration.

Enjoy!
comments: This is exactly what I'm looking for except for that the time doesn't update you have to touch your watch and go into your apps to update time very annoying. I'm using an LG urbane
The time isn't correct The time doesn't stay on time cause the clock lags or something
Almost there Not quite there yet.  Love the customization,  but date is a must for me.  Seems like an easy fix to me.  Also could offer a few more fonts
Awesome but... Time doesn't update which wouldnt be an issue on like anything other than a watch..
Needs better looking fonts! Everything else looks great!
